mapper.select: select acC.categoryName ,trunc(ratio_to_report(acB.amount)over()*100,2) as percent from accountBook acB join actype ac on ac.CLASSIDX=acB.CLASSIDX join acbCategory acC on acC.CATEGORYIDX=acB.CATEGORYIDX where memberIdx=#{memberIdx}
select acB.accountBookDate,acB.amount from accountBook acB where memberIdx=#{memberIdx} order by accountbookdate

SELECT totalDistance, driveDate FROM distance d LEFT OUTER JOIN carAcBook cab ON d.carAcBookIdx = cab.carAcBookIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN memberInfo mi ON cab.MEMBERIDX = mi.MEMBERIDX WHERE mi.memberIdx = #{memberIdx} order by driveDate

select o.oilAmount,o.amount,o.oilingDate from oiling o join carAcBook c on c.caracbookidx=o.caracbookIdx join memberInfo m on m.memberIdx=c.MEMBERIDX where m.memberIdx=#{memberIdx} order by o.oilingdate
